group_1.textRight: So, uh... Look...@You don't have to answer this, but...
Yeah...?
You said you weren't good @at the whole attacking thing...
So how do you actually defeat Witches?
Oh, that...@I'm usually on a team...
There are three of us including me.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so that's how you manage.
Your teammates must be pretty good @fighters, then.

group_1.textRight: Fighters...

group_1.textLeft: Argh, you're really ticking me off!@[chara:100900:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I can't stand it, y'know!

group_1.textRight: Chill out, Rena!
They're...pretty great in a lot of ways...

group_1.textLeft: A lot of ways? Such as?

group_1.textRight: How come you're not fighting@with your usual team today?
Oh... They're, um...@They're far away supportingâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Far away?@Are they into sports or something?

group_1.textRight: No, they went to see...um...@The something...36, I think...?
Uh...@What were they called...?
Oh, Kagurazaka[chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] 36!@So [chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]they went to a concert.

group_1.textLeft: Kagura-who?@Is that a girl group or something?

group_1.textRight: I-I think so, yes...@I don't know[chara:101101:motion_300] much about them, either...

group_1.textLeft: But Akira did, which means she's@totally into cute stuff! I knew it!

group_1.textRight: Wha?! [chara:300801:cheek_2:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]I am not!@I just...you know!

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna have you tell @me allllll about them later!
H'okay, we're here!@This is my house.
Heyyy, I brought some friends over!

group_1.textRight: Uh, h-hello!
Thanks for letting us come over!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hey there.
Come on in!

group_1.textRight: Thanks so much!
Okay guys, all we have is tea,@but I figured I'd bring you some.

group_1.textLeft: Oooh, thanks!
Wow, thank you!
Thank you.@Oh, hey.
You know your sister Natsuki@is quite the cheerleader!

group_1.textRight: Ah, you heard she's a cheerleader, huh?

group_1.textLeft: She gave us the energy [chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100]we needed today!
Hngah![chara:300201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
Don't worry! I won't say anything@about us being Magical Girls!

group_1.textRight: I believe it.
Her cheers are so powerful@they can even cure diseases!

group_1.textLeft: Is that...true...?
